gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `FinancialAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FinancialAssetsMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_FinancialAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_FinancialAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsMovementPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
